parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a CMF code (Cod MFC 3324005), indicating that this is likely electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to András István Demeter, a candidate for the UDMR party in the parliamentary elections.  His name, photo, and position on the ballot (4) are prominently displayed. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Romania.  The use of Facebook as a platform and the paid nature of the post strongly suggest it aims to reach a large number of people. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for András István Demeter. The slogans ("Alege vocea ratiunii!", "România pe primul loc!") and the prominent display of his name, photo, and ballot position directly aim to influence voting behavior. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks any objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate, which is not in line with journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes for a specific candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1335064637876078</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (András István Demeter), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the CMF code and the presence of the post in the Facebook Ad Library), has a clear electoral objective (to garner votes for the candidate), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  The post's content goes beyond simple information and actively promotes a candidate.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>András István Demeter</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 1335064637876078) cu scop electoral, care promovează candidatul András István Demeter (UDMR) pentru alegerile parlamentare, prezentându-i imaginea, numele, poziția pe buletinul de vot (4) și mesaje cu scop de a-l determina pe elector să voteze pentru acesta ("Alege vocea ratiunii!", "România pe primul loc!"),  având un efect electoral clar pozitiv asupra candidatului menționat. Postarea, fiind o reclamă plătită pe Facebook, se adresează unui public larg și depășește limitele activității jurnalistice de informare a publicului, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. Prezența codului CMF confirmă natura electorală a materialului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
